question: "Who says ""Is this a dagger that I see before me"" in a Shakespearean play?"
vanilla_rag_result: The line "Is this a dagger which I see before me, The handle toward my hand? Come, let me clutch thee! I have thee not, and yet I see thee still." is spoken by Macbeth in Act 2, Scene 1 of the play "Macbeth."
